Posts.Content: A dear friend had it also, but he was able to beat it. I think it may be more common than we think. Best of luck!
Posts.Title: Male breast cancer - please share your stories

Posts.Content: I don't know how this turned out, but this post touched me so much. I hope this young man got the help he needed. His doctors sounded so heartless. A dear friend also had male breast cancer, but went to a top hospital in NYC to get treated successfully.
Posts.Title: Young male breast cancer
